parameters.content: Automatically triggers the newsletter workflow when n8n starts up or when the workflow is activated.
Fetches HTML content from Hype Aero space news website with browser-like headers to avoid blocking.
Fetches HTML content from TLDR Tech newsletter website with proper headers for reliable scraping.
Advanced parser that extracts space news articles from Hype Aero HTML, including timestamps & sources.
Enhanced parser that categorizes TLDR Tech articles by AI, Infosec, Tech, etc., with metadata.
Combines articles from both TLDR and Hype Aero feeds into a single data structure .
Extracts and processes all articles from merged feeds, handles multiple data formats and structures.
Checks if any articles were found before proceeding to email generation.
Generates beautiful HTML email with categorized articles, stats, and responsive styling for daily briefing.
Prepares the content and sends formatted newsletter email via SMTP to configured recipient address.
Logs the result in case no articles have been found on any of the predefined sources
